name: Hollywood Hills: The Game
description:
How far will you go to become a Hollywood star?
Here is the chance to find out.

Try to accomplish the path from being broke to becoming an international movie star and remember that every choice and move you make can result in dramatic consequences.

How this story ends is entirely up to you!

- build your own career
- hang out with celebrities
- multiple storylines
- different endings
- currently available in English, Russian, Spanish and Chinese languages
